Name: Nineteenth
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
20 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange and lemon zest twists.
Soak cube with absinthe in base of shaker and MUDDLE .
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
EXPRESS orange and lemon zests over cocktail but garnish with just the lemon zest.
History: Indian Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Manmohan Singh at PCO, New Delhi, India.
